title: There is no miner data for prestateTracer

body: Diffmode in `prestateTracer` was added here: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/25422, this commit: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/commit/5d52a35931bba10f438ce4f41410442dd9cd396c . The commit reveals that it is included in `v1.11.0` and onwards, but not  `1.10.26-stable`
